text: Stefan Bakałowicz () (October 17, 1857, Warsaw - 1947, Rome) was a Polish painter from Warsaw, famous in the Russian Empire. He was noted for his paintings on the subjects of Ancient Rome. From 1936 he was a member of authorities of Polish Association of Artists - "The Capitol".
